website_summaries.verdict: Though the style isn't for everyone, women who want to make a statement will appreciate the elegant look these large sunglasses provide.
pros: Stand out for their bold frames and cat eye look that is a combination of retro and contemporary styling
cons: They are large and a bit heavy on the face
The fit tends to be a bit "off" on some individuals, especially those with small faces/narrow noses
Just a few noted concerns of authenticity

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful + Authentic!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, authentic Tom Ford Anoushka! Very lovely and large! Love them, so glamorous.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Rose

customer_reviews.title: TF for the wind!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I had my doubts about the authenticity before ordering, but when I received them all my worries fled. Their legit TF. This model is older than the one in stores as of 1/2016. Often the lens colors change annually for classic staples in designer lines.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna

customer_reviews.title: So far she's gotten quite a few compliments and I also got some kudos for giving such a fantastic gift. I was a little worried t
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it! I got it for my wife for Valentines Day but she didn't bother waiting to use it. So far she's gotten quite a few compliments and I also got some kudos for giving such a fantastic gift. I was a little worried that these were knockoffs but read a lot of reviews and was confident that I was purchasing legit product. It comes with an authenticity card, which can also be plagiarized, but the craftsmanship and the material used was all I needed to see to be comfortable. And of course, purchasing these glasses on Amazon saved me a bunch of money as opposed to buying it at a retail store. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Megaking559

customer_reviews.title: Authentic designer sunglasses at half the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for this particular pair of sunglasses all over the web. On Tom Ford's website these will set you back about $400. Upon checking amazon I found this seller offering them at half the price. I was at first skeptical if they would be authentic. Upon arrival and inspection all those doubts were dashed. These are authentic & brand new! I would recommend these sunglasses and this seller to anyone looking for designer merchandise at very reasonable prices. I wore my sunglasses for several hours yesterday and I'm happy to report that I'm very satisfied with this purchase. Thank you direct eyewear!
customer_reviews.author: Meg P.

customer_reviews.title: Great cat eye sunnies!
customer_reviews.text: Sexy. Elegant. Very cool. They appear to be totally authentic. Insanely low price on Amazon. So low, the authenticity seems to be questioned by potential buyers(!!). I'd take off 1/2 star as they do tend to leave a mark across the bridge of your nose after a bit wear. I've been meaning to pick up some nose pads to try to eliminate that. Or, I might install a more permanent set like the other reviewer mentioned doing. Heck these guys were half the cost of retail, so it ain't no big thang.
customer_reviews.author: Bebe Blondell

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: Authentic Tom Fords, complete with box, the case pictured and Tom Ford authenticity paperwork. They fit so well and will look great on any face. 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Authentic and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Identical to the same item purchased from Nordstrom and everything is the same (frame, lens, hardware, and logo markings). The only difference was the unique serial number laser-engraved inside the arm. LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: Seattle Chic

customer_reviews.title: Authentic and perfect
customer_reviews.text: 100 percent authentic and Gorgeous! I still can’t believe I got them at this price! Took them into the store to verify they are authentic before leaving this review! Thank u
customer_reviews.author: Snazzi

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE!!! I recently purchased these for twice the price at Nordstrom and returned them to purchase these. Exactly the same...definitely Tom Ford's.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine C.

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Tom Fords
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this purchase initially, but after reading a couple of reviews here and receiving the sunglasses, I am so pleased! These are authentic Tom Ford Anoushka's, and I saved over $200 ( $460 from Neiman Marcus). High quality, sturdy thick frames, and luxurious, if that's what you are looking for! Comes with box, velvet black case and wipe. These are a replacement to a pair that I unfortunately lost to the ocean.....
customer_reviews.author: Mama2Boys

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: These are not knock offs completely the real thing. Saved me over 200.00
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer r langston

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Great sunglasses, very stylish and comfortable. Great tint to the lenses for my taste. Had them for a few months now and they still look great m
customer_reviews.author: daniel cella

customer_reviews.title: My Tom Ford Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sunglasses from Nordstroms for over $400. I decided to check amazon and foun them for 189.00 needless to say the glasses went back to Nordstom. I love these sunglasses they are differently cat shaped. Lots of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina R,

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sunnies!
customer_reviews.text: Authentic Tom Ford glasses. Came well packaged in the original Tom Ford box, case and papers of authenticity. They are oversized but nice looking glasses. I would not hesitate to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: shoe queen

customer_reviews.title: quality product
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these for my wife as a mothers day gift, I haven't given them to her yet but I opened the box to inspect and was very impressed. great fancy packaging and quality looking glasses. im sure she will love them.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey avila

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and authentic
customer_reviews.text: Designer sunnies collector here. These are an awesome style. I was this close to buying from Nordstrom when I thought to look on Amazon. Wouldn't you know it- about 50% less!! No brainer! I did take them to my optometrist for a better fit, but an improper fit was expected considering I didn't even try them on! Easy fix and now they're perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ckerekes

customer_reviews.title: good for the wifey  -relatively clueless husband
customer_reviews.text: On amazon the value is great, much less than in the store. Thickness was novel, but wifey grew to like it. Kept me out of doghouse for a bit

customer_reviews.title: My Fav Sunnies
customer_reviews.text: By far my most favorite sunglasses! I original bought them from Nordstrom years ago for $485! I was so bummed when I lost them in Cabo, I had to buy another pair! Luckily they are much more affordable on Amazon. The quality is perfect! The real deal!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren K.

customer_reviews.title: They’re adorable. I love huge glasses
customer_reviews.text: Yas dahling! They’re adorable. I love huge glasses. They are very light in shade. Not for high sun days. But very cute!

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM 😎😍
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sunglasses and impressive company - these are 100% authentic and gorgeous

customer_reviews.title: Slightly Irregular Product Received
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive these sunglasses. Even more excited that the sunglasses I fell in love with at Nordstrom for $445 were available on-line for less than half the price and the reviews on the product appeared to be legit. I received the sunglasses and they appear to be the real thing but I believe I received a slightly irregular product. They do not sit evenly across my face. The left side is slightly higher. I'll be keeping them and having them adjusted but I am disappointed. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Jackson

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and well made- gorgeous with excellent quality!

customer_reviews.title: My new Tom Ford sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy to receive my Tom Ford sunglasses. Was concerned that they weren’t authentic but actually they came with all Tom Ford packaging. If they aren’t authentic then I am fooled!

customer_reviews.title: I promise you these are authentic. I buy a ...
customer_reviews.text: I promise you these are authentic. I buy a LOT of Tom Ford Eyewear. I had been wanting to buy these at the boutique for quite some time. When I saw them on here for such a drastic difference in price I was concerned about authenticity. I can assure you that these are 100% authentic. All the way down to the box, the case and the polishing cloth! I'm SO excited I saved so much money!

customer_reviews.title: They real

customer_reviews.title: Verry satisfied with design and quality

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my wife, she absolutely loves them. ...
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my wife, she absolutely loves them. I was afraid the "T" on the side was going to be gold in color, turned out to be silver in color.

I was extremly skeptical about the authenticity given the price. But.... I was amazed! They are 100% authentic and perfect! I have been getting compliments everywhere I go. They are so glam, yet edgy. I'm Obsessed!

customer_reviews.title: Korean Noses Need Not Apply :(
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I love TOM FORD! This design is synonymous with his designs. I wanted it so bad. Begged my husband for these for Mother's Day. Got them and they fit horrible. I am Korean and have barely there bridge of my nose. So, if you are Korean or of a nationality that has no real bridge to your nose, save your time and $ and do not buy. Unfortunately, not everyone can wear everything. I had to pay shipping to get my refund so I lost like $10 bucks shipping these back to the seller as they did not provide a prepaid shipping label!!! You know how bad that sucks!

customer_reviews.title: Best sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: My best pair ever! This are authentic! They fit my face like customized. And they don't go up when i smile. (Maybe they could have darker lenses)
customer_reviews.author: lalita28

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely BEAUTIFUL sunglasses--such a classy cut
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely BEAUTIFUL sunglasses--such a classy cut. Just wish they fit my Asian nose bridge better--they stay on when I'm upright, but fall off easily when I bend my head, neck or body towards the ground. The frames are a little wider than most other frames, which is great for me because I do have a wider face, and the outside tips do point upward, covering a bit of my eyebrows but nonetheless achieving a very classy look. The side handles are thicker than most other sunglasses. Unfortunately, these glasses also do not stay put when I put them on my head--they slide off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Erika O.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are what I was looking for at a great price

They are oversized, classy, and chic and will make any outfit pop! Shipping was fast and not to mention these sunglasses are authentic! If you have a round face like I do, these are the sunglasses for you!!

product_meta.title: Tom Ford TF371 01B Black Anoushka Pilot Sunglasses Lens Category 2 Size 57mm
product_meta.description: Tom Ford eschews flashy logos and gimmicky features, in favor of sleek minimalism and carefully chosen details. His unerring eye for design gives his sunglasses a look that is clearly of the moment, yet at home in any era. Tom Ford's collection conveys luxury, glamour and exclusivity, and to guarantee luxury through attention to detail and quality of product. Tom Ford Anoushka FT0371S 01B Sunglasses are cat eye sunglasses
